title: Did Poland’s First Lady Refuse to Shake President Trump’s Hand?
subtitle: A short viral video clip was cut off before showing that Agata Kornhauser-Duda did indeed greet the United States president.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: At an event in Warsaw on 6 July 2017, Polish First Lady Agata Kornhauser-Duda refused to shake hands with Donald Trump.
